Direct Known Subclasses:
AionClientPacket, AionClientPacket, CsClientPacket, GsClientPacket, LsClientPacket
public abstract class BaseClientPacket<T extends AConnection>
extends BasePacket
implements java.lang.Runnable

Base class for every Client Packet

read

public final boolean read()
This method reads data from a packet buffer. If the error occurred while reading data, the connection is closed.

Returns:
true if reading was successful, otherwise false
